      c.customer_sk
    , c.current_addr_sk
    , c.first_name
    , c.last_name
    , o.order_nbr
    , to_date(o.order_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS order_dt
    , o.qty
    , cast(o.item_list_price as numeric(18,2)) AS item_list_price
    , cast(o.sales_price as numeric(18,2)) AS sales_price
    , cast(o.ext_sales_price as numeric(18,2)) AS ext_sales_price
    , p.brand
    , p.item_name
    , p.item_category
From customer AS c
    Inner JOIN order AS o
        ON c.customer_sk = o.bill_to_customer_sk
    Inner JOIN product AS p
        ON o.item_sk = p.item_sk"}},"node-1687843614815":{"SelectFromCollection":{"Index":0,"Inputs":["node-1687843614738"],"Name":"default_group"}},"node-1687843614738":{"Route":{"GroupFiltersList":[{"Filters":[],"GroupName":"default_group","LogicalOperator":"AND"},{"Filters":[{"Negated":false,"Operation":"LTE","Values":[{"Type":"COLUMNEXTRACTED","Value":["ext_sales_price"]},{"Type":"CONSTANT","Value":["0"]}]}],"GroupName":"output_group_1","LogicalOperator":"AND"}],"Inputs":["node-1687842976791"],"Name":"Conditional Router"}},"node-1687843646026":{"S3DirectTarget":{"Compression":"none","Format":"json","Inputs":["node-1687843614816"],"Name":"Amazon S3","PartitionKeys":[],"Path":"s3://3639-datalake-silver/rejectedrecords/","SchemaChangePolicy":{"EnableUpdateCatalog":false}}}}
